title: Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Labour Court) 

(Section 31) 

(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 
(Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) The Labour Court is, for the purposes of section 31 of the Civil Law 
and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), 
designated and may hold hearings before it by remote hearing. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 November, 2020. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [515] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
